text: Iske baad humne Moosa ko har shoba e zindagi ke mutaaliq naseehat aur har pehlu ke mutaaliq wazeh hidayat takhtiyon par likh kar de di, aur ussey kaha: â€œ in hidayaat ko mazboot haathon se sambhaal aur apni qaum ko hukum de ke inke behtar mafhoom ki pairwi karein. Anqareeb main tumhein fasiqon ke ghar dikhaunga
